titles.title: Veterans Employment Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the work opportunity credit with respect to certain unemployed veterans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/10/2009--Introduced. Veterans Employment Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a work opportunity tax credit for the hiring in 2009 or 2010 of unemployed veterans discharged from active duty between September 11, 2001, and December 31, 2010.
